channel.title: Unexpected Bar Shape for CTB6.8
channel.description: I just cut my first CTB 6.X and everything ran pretty well! However, the top bars don't seem to rest as easily on the hive as they did in the older designs and the shape of the bars seems to be inverted from earlier designs. Here's what they look like: Did I do something wrong? Did I misread the 5mm pocket layer or is this correct? Thanks! -Dave

item.title: Unexpected Bar Shape for CTB6.8
item.author: no-reply@example.com (@zorlack Dave S)
item.description:
Dave S wrote:

I just cut my first CTB 6.X and everything ran pretty well!

However, the top bars don't seem to rest as easily on the hive as they did in the older designs and the shape of the bars seems to be inverted from earlier designs. Here's what they look like:

IMG_7348.JPG480x640 130 KB

Did I do something wrong? Did I misread the 5mm pocket layer or is this correct?

Thanks!

-Dave
